get.description: Get paginated list of members with optional filtering by division, rank, and status

post.description: Create a new member with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a single member by their unique ID

patch.description: Update an existing member with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a member by their unique ID

get.description: Find a member by their service number
Get paginated list of checkins with optional filtering by member, division, date range, and direction

post.description: Record a new checkin for a member

get.description: Get current presence statistics (total present, by division)
Retrieve a single checkin by its unique ID

patch.description: Update checkin properties (e.g., flag for review, change direction)

delete.description: Delete a checkin by its unique ID

post.description: Create multiple checkins at once (used for offline sync from kiosks)

get.description: Get all checkins for a specific member
Get paginated list of divisions with optional search and statistics

post.description: Create a new division with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a single division by its unique ID

patch.description: Update an existing division with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a division by its unique ID (only if no members assigned)

get.description: Get paginated list of badges with optional filtering by status and assignment type

post.description: Create a new badge with the provided information

get.description: Get badge statistics (total, assigned, unassigned, by status)
Find a badge by its serial number
Retrieve a single badge by its unique ID

patch.description: Update an existing badge with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a badge by its unique ID

post.description: Assign a badge to a member or visitor
Unassign a badge from its current assignment

get.description: Get list of available badges for assignment to event attendees
Get list of all events

post.description: Create a new event with the provided information
Close an event and optionally expire all attendee badges

get.description: Get presence statistics for an event (total, active, checked out, expired)
Get list of all attendees for an event

post.description: Add a new attendee to an event
Assign a badge to an event attendee

delete.description: Unassign the badge from an event attendee
Remove an attendee from an event

get.description: Retrieve a single event by its unique ID

patch.description: Update an existing event with the provided information

get.description: Get list of all currently signed in visitors
Get paginated list of visitors with optional filtering

post.description: Sign in a new visitor
Sign out a visitor

get.description: Retrieve a single visitor by their unique ID
Get the member who currently holds the Lockup tag

post.description: Transfer the Lockup tag from current holder to a new member

get.description: Get all active (unacknowledged) security alerts

post.description: Create a new security alert (badge disabled, unknown, inactive member)
Acknowledge a security alert (marks as no longer active)

get.description: Retrieve a single security alert by its unique ID
Get today's active DDS assignment
Check if a DDS has been assigned for today
Get audit log entries for DDS responsibility (accepts, assignments, transfers, releases)

post.description: Member self-accepts DDS role (first check-in of day)
Admin assigns DDS role to a member
Admin transfers DDS role from current holder to another member
Release DDS role (during checkout or by admin)

get.description: Get all currently present members and visitors for lockup confirmation screen
Check if a member has the Lockup tag and is authorized to perform building lockup

post.description: Bulk checkout all present members and visitors (requires Lockup tag)

get.description: Returns all visit types with usage counts

post.description: Create a new visit type (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing visit type (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a visit type if not in use (admin only)

get.description: Returns all member statuses with usage counts

post.description: Create a new member status (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing member status (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a member status if not in use (admin only)

get.description: Returns all member types with usage counts

post.description: Create a new member type (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing member type (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a member type if not in use (admin only)

get.description: Returns all badge statuses with usage counts

post.description: Create a new badge status (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing badge status (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a badge status if not in use (admin only)

get.description: Get list of all application settings with optional category filtering

post.description: Create a new application setting (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a single setting by its unique key

put.description: Update an existing setting value (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a setting by its unique key (admin only)

get.description: Get list of all admin users including disabled accounts. Requires admin or developer role.

post.description: Create a new admin user with role-based access control. Admins cannot create developer accounts (privilege escalation protection).

get.description: Retrieve admin user details by ID. Requires admin or developer role.

put.description: Update admin user details. Cannot modify users with higher privileges than actor. Role changes tracked in audit log.

delete.description: Permanently delete admin user (developer only). Cannot delete yourself or the last active developer account.

post.description: Reset password for admin user (admin-initiated). Cannot reset passwords for higher-privilege users.
Soft delete admin user account by disabling. Cannot disable yourself or the last active developer account.
Re-enable a disabled admin user account. Cannot enable users with higher privileges than actor.

get.description: Get all items for a given list type (event_role, rank, mess, moc) with usage counts. Items are ordered by displayOrder and name.
get.summary: List all items for a list type

post.description: Create a new list item with a unique code. Code is automatically normalized to lowercase with underscores. If displayOrder is not provided, item is appended to the end.

put.description: Update the display order of list items. Provide an array of item IDs in the desired order. displayOrder will be set sequentially (1, 2, 3, ...).

get.description: Get the number of records currently using this list item. Used to prevent deletion of items in use.
get.summary: Get usage count for a list item

put.description: Update an existing list item. All fields are optional. If updating code, uniqueness is checked within the list type.

delete.description: Delete a list item. System items cannot be deleted. Items currently in use cannot be deleted - reassign or delete the records using this item first.

get.description: Get all training years ordered by start date (newest first)

post.description: Create a new training year with holiday exclusions and day exceptions. Admin role required.

get.description: Get the training year marked as current
Get a specific training year by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing training year. Admin role required.

delete.description: Delete a training year. Cannot delete the current training year. Admin role required.

put.description: Mark a training year as current. Automatically unsets other current years via database trigger. Admin role required.

get.description: Get all BMQ courses with optional active filter. Includes enrollment count for each course.

post.description: Create a new BMQ course with training schedule. Admin role required.

get.description: Get all BMQ course enrollments for a specific member with course details
Get a specific BMQ course by its unique identifier with enrollment count

put.description: Update an existing BMQ course. Admin role required.

delete.description: Delete a BMQ course and all associated enrollments. Admin role required.

get.description: Get all enrollments for a BMQ course with member details

post.description: Enroll a member in a BMQ course. Prevents duplicate enrollments. Admin role required.

put.description: Update enrollment status (enrolled, completed, withdrawn). Requires completion date when marking completed. Admin role required.

delete.description: Remove a member enrollment from a BMQ course. Admin role required.

get.description: Get all report configuration settings with their values and timestamps

put.description: Update multiple report settings in a single transaction. Admin role required.

get.description: Get a specific report setting by its key (schedule, working_hours, thresholds, member_handling, formatting)

put.description: Update a specific report setting. Creates the setting if it does not exist. Admin role required.

get.description: Get all security alert rule configurations

put.description: Update multiple alert configurations in a single transaction. Admin role required.

get.description: Get a specific alert configuration by its key (badge_disabled, badge_unknown, inactive_member, etc.)

put.description: Update a specific alert configuration. Creates the configuration if it does not exist. Admin role required.

post.description: Generate a summary of current day check-ins including present FT staff, absent FT staff, and present reserve members, with optional filtering by division and member type
Generate attendance report for training nights over a specified period, with attendance percentages, trends, threshold flags, and BMQ badges
Generate attendance report for a specific BMQ course, showing enrollment status and attendance percentages for all enrolled members
Generate complete personnel roster with member details, optionally filtered by division and sorted by division/rank or alphabetically
Generate summary of all visitors over a date range, with optional filtering by visit type and organization, including visit duration statistics
Clear all data from members, checkins, visitors, badges, events, event_attendees, and event_checkins tables. Requires admin role.
Clear all data from a specific table. Requires admin role.
Clear all data and reset cached services to initial state. Requires admin role.

get.description: Get default parameters for attendance simulation. Requires admin role.

post.description: Validate simulation parameters and estimate impact. Requires admin role.
Generate realistic check-in data over a date range. Requires admin role.
Set all member creation dates to a target date for testing. Requires admin role.

get.description: Get list of available database seeding scenarios. Requires admin role.

post.description: Populate database with a predefined scenario (empty, minimal, standard, realistic, stress_test). Requires admin role.

get.description: Get all active members with badge serial numbers and current presence status. Disabled in production.

delete.description: Create check-out records for all currently present members. Broadcasts presence update via WebSocket. Disabled in production.

post.description: Simulate an RFID badge scan with the same behavior as real hardware scans (creates checkin records, broadcasts WebSocket updates). Disabled in production.

info.title: Sentinel API
info.description: RFID-based attendance tracking system for HMCS Chippawa naval reserve unit. Provides comprehensive APIs for member management, badge assignment, attendance tracking, visitor management, security alerts, reporting, and administrative operations.

tags.name: lists
tags.description: Consolidated list endpoints for dropdowns and references

tags.name: dev
tags.description: Development endpoints for testing and debugging
